remarks: The ` X ` we defined for coin-flip is a random variable.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
coinflip.h $e |- H e. _V $.
coinflip.t $e |- T e. _V $.
coinflip.th $e |- H =/= T $.
coinflip.2 $e |- P = ( ( # |` ~P { H , T } ) oFC / 2 ) $.
coinflip.3 $e |- X = { <. H , 1 >. , <. T , 0 >. } $.
coinfliprv $p |- X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) $.
